name: MIS Cohort Report for Excel
description: PDD0237 v00.01.00 Last Modified:06/10/2023 This report has been specifically built to support the Cohort lead in the North Midlands Prison Group. They hold a an interest in determinate sentenced prisoners, Care Experienced (these include alerts of Former looked after child 21/25 and qualifies for assistance or advice), Foreign Nationals / Immigration Detainees and Young Adults (aged 18-25)

dataset.name: Indeterminate Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CARE_FLAG, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END IN ('Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CODE, CODE_DESCRIPTION, CARE_FLAG, IS_INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE_, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, COUNT(INDETERMINATE_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_NOMS_COUNT_INDETERMINATE, CASE WHEN MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'LR_IPP' THEN 'LR_IPP' ELSE CASE WHEN MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'IPP' THEN 'IPP' ELSE 'Indeterminate' END END AS V_IPP_LR_IPP_SPLIT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Care Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, CASE WHEN NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CARE_FLAG, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS IN ('ACTIVE') AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK IN ('LFC21', 'LFC25', 'OCYP', 'LCE', 'LPQAA') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CODE, CARE_FLAG, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(CARE_ALERTS.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_NOMS_COUNT_CARE_ALERTS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Foreign Nationals
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, CASE WHEN NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CARE_FLAG, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_CODE IN ('BRIT'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CODE, CARE_FLAG, CODE_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_COUNT_NOMS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Immigration Detainee
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, CASE WHEN NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CARE_FLAG, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('14FTR_ORA', '14FTRHDC_ORA', 'CUR_ORA', 'FTR/08', 'FTR_HDC', 'FTR_HDC_ORA', 'FTR_ORA', 'FTR_SCH15', 'FTRSCH15_ORA', 'HDR_ORA', 'LR', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_EPP', 'LR_ES', 'LR_HDC', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LASPO_AR', 'LR_LASPO_DR', 'LR_LIFE', 'LR_MLP', 'LR_ORA', 'LR_SEC236A', 'LR_SEC91_ORA', 'LR_YOI', 'LR_YOI_ORA', 'FTRSCH18_ORA', 'FTRSCH18', 'LR_EDS18', 'LR_EDS21', 'LR_SOPC18', 'LR_SOPC21', 'LRSEC250_ORA', 'LR_ALP_CDE18', 'LR_ALP_CDE21', 'LR_EDSU18') THEN 'Recall' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '0' THEN 'Dead' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '1' THEN 'Indeterminate Sentence' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('2', '3') THEN 'Sentenced' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('4', '5', '6', '7') THEN 'Convicted Unsentenced' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('9', '10') OR AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'CIV_RMD' THEN 'Civil Prisoner' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('8', '11') THEN 'Immigration Detainee' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('12', '13', '14') THEN 'Remand' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'UNKNOWN' THEN 'Unknown' ELSE 'Other' END AS LEGAL_STATUS_GROUPING, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('14FTR_ORA', '14FTRHDC_ORA', 'CUR_ORA', 'FTR/08', 'FTR_HDC', 'FTR_HDC_ORA', 'FTR_ORA', 'FTR_SCH15', 'FTRSCH15_ORA', 'HDR_ORA', 'LR', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_EPP', 'LR_ES', 'LR_HDC', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LASPO_AR', 'LR_LASPO_DR', 'LR_LIFE', 'LR_MLP', 'LR_ORA', 'LR_SEC236A', 'LR_SEC91_ORA', 'LR_YOI', 'LR_YOI_ORA', 'FTRSCH18_ORA', 'FTRSCH18', 'LR_EDS18', 'LR_EDS21', 'LR_SOPC18', 'LR_SOPC21', 'LRSEC250_ORA', 'LR_ALP_CDE18', 'LR_ALP_CDE21', 'LR_EDSU18') THEN 'Recall' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '0' THEN 'Dead' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND = '1' THEN 'Indeterminate Sentence' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('2', '3') THEN 'Sentenced' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('4', '5', '6', '7') THEN 'Convicted Unsentenced' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('9', '10') OR AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'CIV_RMD' THEN 'Civil Prisoner' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('8', '11') THEN 'Immigration Detainee' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LEGAL_STATUS_BAND IN ('12', '13', '14') THEN 'Remand' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE = 'UNKNOWN' THEN 'Unknown' ELSE 'Other' END IN ('Immigration Detainee') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CODE, CARE_FLAG, CODE_DESCRIPTION, LEGAL_STATUS_GROUPING, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(IMMIGRATION_DETAINEE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_COUNT_IMMIGRATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Young Adults
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, CASE WHEN NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CARE_FLAG, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12) AS OFFENDER_AGE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12) BETWEEN 18 AND 25)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, TYPE, CODE, CARE_FLAG, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_AGE, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_AGE_18_TO_25 FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_IND_SENT_NOMS_LD
field.legacySql: =Count ([Indeterminate Sentence].[NOMS Number]) Where ([Indeterminate Sentence].[Care Code] InList("LD";"LDY") And [Indeterminate Sentence].[Care Flag] ="Y")

field.name: $ref:V_IPP_LR_IPP_SPLIT
field.legacySql: =If([Main Legal Status Code] ="LR_IPP";"LR_IPP";If([Main Legal Status Code] ="IPP";"IPP";"Indeterminate"))

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_CARE_NOMS_LD
field.legacySql: =Count ([Care Alerts].[NOMS Number]) Where ([Care Alerts].[Care Code] InList("LD";"LDY") And [Care Alerts].[Care Flag] ="Y")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_IMM_DET_NOMS_LD
field.legacySql: =Count ([Immigration Detainee].[NOMS Number]) Where ([Immigration Detainee].[Care Code] InList("LD";"LDY") And [Immigration Detainee].[Care Flag] ="Y")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_YNG_ADU_NOMS_LD
field.legacySql: =Count ([Young Adults].[NOMS Number]) Where ([Young Adults].[Care Code] InList("LD";"LDY") And [Young Adults].[Care Flag] ="Y")
